issue.title: [JS] Add Table/Schema/RecordBatch `selectAt(...indices)` method
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4557](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4557). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Presently Table, Schema, and RecordBatch have basic `select(...colNames)` implementations. Having an easy `selectAt(...colIndices)` impl would be a nice complement, especially when there are duplicate column names.
